title: Driving Factors Behind Adopting Virtual Testbeds for ICS Cybersecurity Education.
authors: Taiwo Peter Akinremi, Joel Kwesi Appiah, Amir Reza Asadi, Opetunde Ibitoye, Saheed Popoola

title_zh: 推动采用虚拟测试平台进行工控系统网络安全教育的驱动因素。
